archiefmat.titel: Documenten met betrekking tot het functioneren van Bloys van Treslong als provisioneel gouverneur van Suriname
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents related to the functioning of Bloys van Treslong as acting Governor of Suriname
archiefmat.scope: Inventory number 1 is a copy of the governor's journal regarding the period December 1802-December 1803. Number 2 is a register of outgoing letters for the period January-May 1803. Number 3 contains 127 documents, both letters and other papers received and copies of letters sent.
